Title: The Azure Hatchling
Description:
An egg from the blue dragonflight is ready to hatch.

Report to Axkall in the Ruby Lifeshrine to pick up the egg. Then, I request that you bring the egg to the Azure Oathstone to hatch in a location strong with our flight's power.

Once this is complete, return here with the hatchling, where we will further take care of it.
ObjectivesText: Collect the Blue Dragon Egg at the Ruby Lifeshrine then hatch it at the Azure Oathstone.
CompletionText: Have you brought the newest hatchling?
RewardText: It is nice to care for a hatchling from my own flight. He reminds me of my days in Azsuna.
